articles.author: Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: More places in the US lift mask mandates. One local leader says the honor system is already not working - CNN
articles.description: Several days since the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said fully vaccinated Americans can -- for the most part -- ditch their masks, more places are announcing changes to their mask policies, or doing away with the requirement altogether.

articles.title: US NCAA: Fil-Am guard Remy Martin transfers to Kansas - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: Filipino-American point guard Remy Martin has transferred to Kansas, but is still planning to test his stock in the upcoming NBA Rookie Draft.
articles.content:
Filipino-American point guard Remy Martin has transferred to Kansas, but is still planning to test his stock in the upcoming NBA Rookie Draft, according to reports from US media.
